summary: A white woman enters into a romance with a Mexican Indian. The racial barriers between the lovers prove to be insurmountable, resulting in tragedy.
cast: María Félix|Pedro Infante|Andrés Soler|Carlos Orellana|Miguel Arenas|Manuel Arvide|Guillermo Bravo Sosa|Polo Ramos|Eduardo Fajardo|Julio Aldama|Alicia del Lago|Paco Crow|Leonor Gómez|Manuel Trejo Morales|Amado Zumaya
title: Tizoc (Amor indio)
